thread.title: DONG

author: DONG
title: DONG
text: They are bunch of lying people, their workers does not know what they are talking about. I use this site a lot for my traveling, but this time I needed to change my time of departure. They sent a email saying "I have two hours to change my mind because it is not confirmed yet." So me needing to change the time, called the contact number but the stupid, horrible, rude worker kept on saying I had to pay the cancellation fee. Then they did not send the department after I forwarded the email to him. After I pinned down the facts, he just blamed the other department . After arguing for an hour, he said, "sorry two hours has passed." which means that I was right and I should've got my money back and I still want my money back because this is a scam, and bunch of bull CRAP This company is full of CRAP and does not AGREE WITH THEIR OWN TERMS and I would never recommend it and use it again.
